idea.name: EcoEd Empowerment
idea.mission: To provide quality environmental education and sustainable livelihood training to underserved communities, empowering them to combat climate change and poverty simultaneously.
goals: Educate 10,000 individuals on environmental conservation and sustainable practices annually
Train 5,000 people in green job skills each year
Implement 100 community-based renewable energy projects in rural areas by 2030
Reduce poverty rates by 20% in target communities through sustainable livelihood programs

targetMarket.occupation: Unemployed, underemployed, or in traditional non-sustainable industries
targetMarket.geography: Rural and peri-urban areas in developing countries

idea.primaryProduct: Integrated environmental education and sustainable livelihood training programs
sdgs: SDG 8: Decent Work and Economic Growth
